text: 👏🏼👍🏼PGIMER Specialists backing preventive health care! 💡🏥🌟It's great to see PGIMER extending their community outreach programs to adopted centers, educating people on disease prevention & timely medical care. 💯👨‍⚖️This will not only improve health outcomes but also alleviate financial burdens on patients & institutions. 💰🏥Kudos to PGI director Prof Vivek Lal for emphasizing the importance of this educational outreach! 🙌🏼The department of nephrology leading the way, interacting directly with community members. 💌👨‍✈️A monthly roster and awareness talks - great initiative! 📣👍🏼Let's work together for better health outcomes and a healthier society! 🤝🏼💪🏼
